TextBlock.Text: ALNUS: Our teacher said that thereâ€™s something we should see at the core of this planet.
BETULA: Interesting. Did she mention anything regarding how she intends for us to get down there?
ALNUS: Something about us â€œridingâ€? this rock here.
DAUCUS: What do you mean by â€œridingâ€?? The rock is only present here half of the times we look and, when it is here, it doesnâ€™t move in the slightest.
ADONSONIA: Wait, I may actually have an idea. I seem to remember a story my grandfather told me about a rock like this. I think we just need to make the area around the rock dark somehow...
